about_the_game:
There was once a place in the center of the universe where the laws of creation were kept, he maintained the differentiation and balance of the universe, and kept the world in order, it has no beginning and no end, it contains all things in the world, everything in the world contains it, it unifies nothingness and everything, and the things that oppose each other are unified with each other, and the worlds are differentiated in order to better tend to balance, but one day, an early life form born in the universe has mastered the knowledge of the law of creation after tens of millions of years, so that it has an independent consciousness and differentiates into two gods, billions of years, They restrain each other and have differences in their attitudes towards life, among which the evil gods, because the universe has entered a period of chaos, many living beings have fallen into negativity, causing the evil gods to gain the upper hand, and infected with the operation of the law of creation, resulting in the shattering of the firmament of the primordial continent, the climate is abnormal, and the player needs to defeat the demon god of creation and restore the operation of the law of creation

Open world, you can have your own exploration, collect props and weapons that enhance attributes, and follow a certain order to clear the dungeon, magic has various attributes, if it happens to be weak in the enemy's attributes, it can greatly increase the damage, and players also have their own attribute resistance, and the corresponding enemy magic attributes can reduce the damage by half

Game Features:
1 The large map can be explored freely, including different dungeons
2 kinds of enemies, each with its own unique skills and attributes, can be coordinated with each other, and the enemies also have their own combos
3. Rich plot, different dungeons have their own story backgrounds
4 The game does not use dark mines, and combines different enemies in the form of dungeons to increase the refreshment
5 Dozens of weapon magic, each with different attributes, random skills, for different copies can be quickly cleared
6 high-definition 2D pixels, bringing players a sense of fantasy and challenge
